Summary Currently working as a Computer Technician and Systems Administrator as well as a full-time student at the University of Akron, I strive to work with the latest advancements in technology and adapt my skill set to suit the needs of the ever-changing technological market. 
 
I enjoy delving into new things to learn them as thoroughly as possible. I am a quick learner that can adapt as needed. 
 
In my experiences, I have worked with consumer and business technology in both a professional and academic setting. Being able to work with businesses in a variety of fields has allowed me to gain insight to the best practices, needs, and workings of a wide range of businesses from medical to manufacturing, and much in-between. 
 
 
My goal is to learn and expand my knowledge for as long as I can. Technology changes rapidly and I hope to bring to you all an up to date skill-set to the table at any time, whether you be a business or individual consumer. Street View, I lead a team responsible for developing the serving systems and launch pipelines for Google Street View. Panoramio, I lead a team responsible for the continued maintenance of the Panoramio photo community.
